channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: How US views of immigration have changed since Trump took office, according to Gallup polling
item.description: A Gallup poll shows a substantial jump in the share of Americans who view immigration as positive for the U.S. since President Donald Trump took office.

item.title: Mourning begins in Texas where more than 170 are still missing from flash floods
Warning sirens helped this small Texas community survive flooding
